The house represent a traditional british architecture, emblematic of the old Chapinero neighborhood of mid 20th century. At 5 minutes you´ll be at `Zona G´and at 10 minutes you´ll be in the `Zona Rosa´of the city. At the same time, at 10 to 15 minutes to the other side you´ll be at the historical center of Bogota. You cannot be better located!

Our staff is always available to advice, search and help you with basically any requestment or question you have about the city, activities, plans, hidden gems for you to have the best experience and time in the city.

Our mixed dorms, private rooms and common areas are specially design for travelers. All of them are equipped with personal lockers and each bed has its own power sockets. In our common areas you can relax and chill out while you can as well socialize with fellow travelers. Helpful staff, brilliant location (very safe and relax spot), daily good quality cleaning, multiple, varied services and a cool atmosphere are accompanied your staying with:

-Free Concierge service in real time during your staying inside and outside HOBU
-Hobu travel agency (complementary service)
-Laundry service
-Free WIFI/internet
-Towels included
-Breakfast included
-Open and fully equipped kitchen (24/7)
-Permanent hot water showers
-Lounge with big TV screen and fireplace
-Many hooks per dorm
-Bar
-Bigger beds than the standard in the city
-Each bed is equipped with premium high quality lingerie, mattresses, sheets, duvets and pillows
-Free luggage storage
-Free maps
-Hair drier
-Iron
-Coffee Machine (complementary)
- 24 hour reception
-Transport service (complementary)

description.description: Hobu is located at the most unique and central point of Bogota for you to relax, meet people, try local varied and mix food. As well is pretty easy to move around, close to the historical center and to enjoy the entertainment, shopping, restaurants, alternative bars and cafes in the north of the city. High safety, cool environment, relax,trendy and urban vibes are next to us and you! A key point for you to enjoy and know the cultural, historical and gastronomical variety of our unique and charming city.
